EquipmentCape10.name: EquipmentCape10
EquipmentCape10.desc: Put this cape on, and you'll get +13% AFK GAINS, 6 Weapon Power, and 10 Defence! Don't listen to that purple noob flower, STARFLOWER BEST FLOWER!

EquipmentCape9.name: EquipmentCape9
EquipmentCape9.desc: Put this cape on, and you'll get 10% ALL STAT, 4 Weapon Power, and 10 Defence! Purple flower best flower!

Timecandy6.name: Timecandy6
Timecandy6.desc: READ THIS BEFORE YOU BUY. This purchase has a 15% chance for the coveted 72 hr candy, and a 85% chance to just be a lame 1 hour candy. Ok you can stop reading now.

EquipmentPendant33.name: EquipmentPendant33
EquipmentPendant33.desc: Whoever wears this pendant will get 3.00X more money from monsters! Max out that Upgrade Vault in... well, not no time, but in slightly less time!

ClassSwapB.name: ClassSwapB
ClassSwapB.desc: Gives 1 Elite Class Swap token. Use this to swap between elite classes of a certain category, like Blood Berserker to Divine Knight

desc: Use this on a 4 star card to upgrade it to 5 stars! It works like 4 star cardifiers do, you get to choose which card gets upgraded, no randomness involved!! Yippie!!!
Wait, how can this 5 star cardifier be here, when THAT 5 star cardifier is over THERE..? WAIT, WHY DOES THIS ONLY COST 1 GEM?? What has my shop become, how could I let this happen...
